ValidationRule.description: When the In Store Status is closed, you can't modify it anymore
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $User.BypassVR__c ), ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE(In_Store_Status__c) , "Closed") , OR( ISPICKVAL( In_Store_Status__c , "Pending"), ISPICKVAL( In_Store_Status__c , "New") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The In Store Status is closed, you can't modify it anymore
